```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(learnr)

options(error = function() {
  lobstr::cst();
  print(
    list(
      calls = sys.calls(),
      frames = lapply(sys.frames(), function(f) ls.str(envir = f))
    )
  )
})
options(
  tutorial.exercise.evaluator = learnr:::forked_evaluator,
  tutorial.exercise.evaluator.onstart = function(pid) {
    options(error = function() {
      lobstr::cst();
      print(
        list(
        calls = sys.calls(),
          frames = lapply(sys.frames(), function(f) ls.str(envir = f))
        )
      )
    })
  }
)
```

The following code computes the answer to 1+1. Change it so it computes 2 + 2:

```{r addition, exercise=TRUE}
1 + 1
```
